summary: A Dragonborn DLC only revamp of Frea of the Skaal. Other Dragonborn followers MIGHT be added along as well.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=RIGHT] http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/brelynapromote.jpg[/IMG]
[center][color=orange][size=4]1)[/size][/color]  Frea and other Dragonborn followers are still not compatible with Ultimate Follower Overhaul. Read the troubleshooting section for overhauls.

[color=orange][size=4]2)[/size][/color] Other followers from Dragonborn MIGHT come and will be updated on this page. 
[color=orange] 3) [/color] DO NOT make requests to change this/add that. 

[color=orange][size=4]4)[/size][/color]No nude images please! This page is meant to be SFW. 
[/CENTER]


[COLOR=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]ABOUT[/SIZE][/FONT] [/COLOR]
This is a small NPC revamp of Frea. All textures are [color=orange]STANDALONE[/color], but there is a tutorial in the articles section to swap for texture of your own preference.  I also added the perk Lightfoot to her so that she won’t activate traps.

Unlike most of my revamps, Frea doesn’t have any warpaint because for lore-immersion sake, the Skaals in the village had no facepaint either specifically. It was also my intention not to make her a doll face, but reshape her face to be more accurate to my perception of her character.

[COLOR=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Installation[/SIZE][/FONT] [/COLOR]
Use NMM or manually drop the folder in the Skyrim root folder.
[COLOR=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Uninstallation[/SIZE][/FONT] [/COLOR]
Use NMM or delete all of the files manually. 

If uninstalling manually, first delete the [color=orange]frea.esp[/color] from the Data Files load order.  Also delete the standalone textures folder located at:
[size=5] For 34-bit users [/size]Computer/ OS (C: )/ Program Files/Steam/Steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/textures/Beans/DragonbornDLC/Frea
 [size=5] For 64-bit user [/size]Computer/ OS (C: )/ Program Files(x86)/Steam/Steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/textures/Beans/DragonbornDLC/Frea


Secondly remove the .TARGA, .dds, and the .NIF files with the codes [size=3] xx017934 [/size] located at
[color=#C0C0C0]skyrim/Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Dragonborn.esm and
skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Dragonborn.esm[/color]



[COLOR=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Troubleshooting[/SIZE][/FONT] [/COLOR]
[color=orange]As of February 18, 2013[/color], UFO hasn’t released a compability patch for Dragonborn followers yet. [color=orange]This means that Frea can’t be dismissed or wait if the UFO.esp is enabled.[/color] 

To dismiss her, simply uncheck your UFO.esp in the load order (NOT UNINSTALL) and then save your game. Without UFO.esp, Frea’s follower functionalities will work normally. Just note that if you have another follower from the vanilla game that their functionality will go screwy though.

 It is also possible the next time you visit Frea that she will be naked if you disabled UFO, if you used the “You could dress better” talk option.

 [COLOR=#808080][font=cENTURY gOTHIC] [SIZE=7]Credits[/SIZE][/FONT] [/COLOR]
Thank you [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554]Navetsea[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869]Mr Lenski[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784]Xenius[/url], and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30411]Ithot[/url] for the appearance mods that made this possible. Also thank you kyokushinoyama anaphielfor [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30158]K ENB[/URL] and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23029] Goddess ENB[/url].
